topics.title: Data Audit Trail for Academia
topics.content: By tokenizing data assets and using smart contracts to manage access control, each transaction, which includes publishing, sale, exchange, and consumption of data services, is logged automatically and immutable on the distributed ledger. This creates a data audit trail for academia which allows research institutions to monitor the use of their assets and gain attribution for their work.

topics.title: Different Monetization Options
topics.content: Moreover, research institutions can decide whether the access to the data assets is granted for free or if the data assets are monetized to cover the costs of generating and storing the data sets, or for researching and developing algorithms.
